slide.title: Modifying documents
slide.example:
<?php
$m = new Mongo;
$c = $m->demo->elephpants;
$c->remove();

$c->insert( [
  '_id' => 'e43',
  'name' => 'Dumbo'
] );

$c->update(
  [ 'name' => 'Dumbo' ], // criteria
  [ '$set' => array [ 'age' => '17' ] ] // modifiers
);

// document is now:
[
  '_id' => 'e43',
  'name' => 'Dumbo',
  'age' => '17',
]
?>
